html:
2 Nephi 23:1

This opening verse speaks of the "burden" (message of doom) that is lifted up against Babylon. Isaiah's seeric powers allowed him to see in vision what was to take place.

Isaiah 13


1 The burden of Babylon, which Isaiah the son of Amoz did see.
2 Nephi 23


1 The burden of Babylon, which Isaiah the son of Amoz did see.
